title: Scrawling pen-like font
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317154845im_/http:/typophile.com/files/title_5374.jpg)
  
I ran this through some of the font ID sites, so deleted the parts that overlapped. It reads "IT'S ALL ABOUT YOU!"

Font: 

 GE HandyScript 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317154845/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")

author: spottedjack

comments.content:
It looks like **GE HandyScript** from GraphXEdge which is probably based on **VersatileScript** digitized by Dan X. Solo  
The problem is it's not available anymore in GraphXEdge script fonts section:  
 [http://www.graphxedge.com/fonts/scriptfonts.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317154845/http:/www.graphxedge.com/fonts/scriptfonts.htm "http://www.graphxedge.com/fonts/scriptfonts.htm")
